title: i am here to bitch about the game
body:
WHERE THE FUCK IS REVIVE
HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO MAKE THE ENEMIES HAVE TO KILL ME 4 TIMES BEFORE I STAY DEAD
RIOT KEEPS GOIN ON ABOUT GETTIN RID OF "ANTI-FUN" SHIT
AND THEY REMOVE THE FUNNEST(dat a word?) SUMM SPELL IN THE GAME

WHAT THE FUCK RIOT
THESE GUYS ARE ALLERGIC TO FUN
